sentences.en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentences.cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

sentences.en: If the soil dries out the plants may bolt.
sentences.cn: 如果土壤过干，植株可能会过早结实。

sentences.en: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.
sentences.cn: 如果任由土壤变干，这棵树可能会枯死。

sentences.en: Keep the soil moist. That way, the seedling will flourish.
sentences.cn: 保持土壤湿润，那样幼苗就能茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Nitrates are chemicals that occur naturally in water and the soil.
sentences.cn: 硝酸盐是水和土壤中自然存在的化学物质。

sentences.en: Rake the soil, press the seed into it, then cover it lightly.
sentences.cn: 将土耙松，把种子种在土里，然后轻轻地盖上土。

sentences.en: Roses grow well in a clay soil.
sentences.cn: 蔷薇适宜在黏质土中生长。

sentences.en: She gathered loose soil and let it filter slowly through her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她捧起疏松的泥土，任其缓缓地从指间漏下。

sentences.en: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.cn: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

sentences.en: Some solitary bees make their nests in burrows in the soil.
sentences.cn: 一些独居蜂会把巢筑在田间的地洞里。

sentences.en: The chalky soil around Saumur produces the famous Anjou wines.
sentences.cn: 索米尔周围的白垩质土壤出产著名的安茹葡萄酒。

sentences.en: The soil must not be overwatered, especially during the first few weeks.
sentences.cn: 切忌土壤过涝，尤其在最初几周。

sentences.en: The soil washed from the hills is silting up the hydroelectric dams.
sentences.cn: 从山上冲刷下来的泥土就要让水电大坝淤塞了。

sentences.en: The water slowly drained away, down through the porous soil.
sentences.cn: 水慢慢流走了，渗入了疏松的土壤。

sentences.en: This leaves fertile soil unprotected and prone to erosion.
sentences.cn: 这会让肥沃的土壤暴露在外，使其容易受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: Traditional slash and burn farming methods have exhausted the soil.
sentences.cn: 传统的刀耕火种农业方式耗尽了土地的肥力。

sentences.en: When the soil is dry, more moisture is lost from the plant.
sentences.cn: 土壤干燥时，植物会流失更多的水分。
